title: Want to Lock Down for the Climate?
sub_head: Hitting environmentalists’ emission timetables would take far more than even what the pandemic forced.
body: Editor’s note: As November’s global climate conference in Glasgow draws near, important facts about climate change don’t always make it into the dominant media coverage. We’re here to help. Each Thursday contributor Bjorn Lomborg will provide some important background so readers can have a better understanding of the true effects of climate change and the real costs of climate policy.
